sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; export default function Card() { const [data, setData] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://44.223.200.156:8081/producto') .then(result => result.json()) .then(data => { setData(data); }) }, []); return (
{data.map(e => (
{e.nombre}
  • Stock:{e.stock}
  • Fabricante:{e.fabricante}

S/{e.precio}

))}
); }
